areadata.name: Стены Анона
areadata.resetMessage: Ты слышишь лязг доспехов стражи, патрулирующей стены Анона.

helps.node:
Город-крепость {hh1423Анон{x обнесен высокими стенами и защищен мощной многоуровневой системой фортификаций. Стены круглосуточно патрулируются гвардейцами и боевыми магами.
Жизнь гвардейцев тяжела и полна ответственности, они -- пример для всего города. По легенде, один из сержантов стражи когда-то был непобедимым воином. Его клинок разил без промаха, а его волшебный доспех был непроницаем для врагов. Но гордыня и зло очернили его сердце. Однажды он надругался над молодой девушкой и хладнокровно убил ее. Сержант был пойман, предан справедливому суду и жестокой казни. А боги прокляли его душу и обрекли ее вечно скитаться на месте своего преступления...

node.description: These dedicated guards are among the elite of the guards of the city, selected for their dedication, endurance and keen eyesight. They remain eternally vigilant, not wishing for their city to fall under the domination of evil forces.
node.long_descr: An east wall guard patrols the battlements, ever alert for approaching enemies.

off.add: bash berserk disarm dodge kick parry assist_guard assist_vnum

node.description: These dedicated guards are among the elite of the guards of the city, selected for their dedication, endurance and keen eyesight. They remain eternally vigilant, not wishing for their city to fall under the domination of evil forces.
node.long_descr: A south wall guard patrols the battlements, ever alert for approaching enemies.

off.add: bash berserk disarm dodge kick parry assist_guard assist_vnum

node.long_descr: A north wall guard patrols the battlements, ever alert for approaching enemies.

off.add: bash berserk disarm dodge kick parry assist_guard assist_vnum

node.description: These dedicated guards are among the elite of the guards of the city, selected for their dedication, endurance and keen eyesight. They remain eternally vigilant, not wishing for their city to fall under the domination of evil forces.
node.long_descr: An west wall guard patrols the battlements, ever alert for approaching enemies.

off.add: bash berserk disarm dodge kick parry assist_guard assist_vnum

node.description: This stern fellow is in charge of the guards on this wall, and has no time for idle chit-chat with civilians. Or silly adventurers either. Scars on his face and the cold look in his eye bespeak of a man who definitely knows how to handle himself in battle.
node.long_descr: The east wall guard captain stares grimly at you.

off.add: bash berserk disarm dodge kick parry assist_guard assist_vnum

node.description: This stern fellow is in charge of the guards on this wall, and has no time for idle chit-chat with civilians. Or silly adventurers either. Scars on his face and the cold look in his eye bespeak of a man who definitely knows how to handle himself in battle.
node.long_descr: The south wall guard captain stares grimly at you.

off.add: bash berserk disarm dodge kick parry assist_guard assist_vnum

node.long_descr: The north wall guard captain stares grimly at you.

node.long_descr: The west wall guard captain stares grimly at you.

node.description: The knights of Anon are a well-respected and renowned order that has been in existence for 15 generations. However constant wars and incursions of chaos have severely depleted their numbers, and now very few remain.
node.long_descr: A well-armored knight strolls the battlements.

off.add: bash berserk disarm dodge kick parry

node.description: While Elves are not by nature particularly interested in war or soldiering, there are, as in all races, "black sheep" who feel the call to arms as keenly as any Dwarven or Human mercenary. These few become mercenaries or adventurers. Some of them, such as this fellow, labor for the forces of good, if the price is right.
node.long_descr: An elven battle mage stands ready.

node.description: This ancient veteran is clad in an immaculate uniform that sports more medals than it does material. He marches proudly along, constantly on duty, ever eager to make sure order is maintained on HIS walls.
node.long_descr: The marshal of the guards marches back and forth, inspecting his men.

node.description: The crossbowmen of the city of Anon are renowned for their marksmanship across the land. Only the very best can ever hope to join their elite ranks.
node.long_descr: A crossbowman patrols here, alert for invaders.

node.description: This doughty dwarf spends all his time repairing damaged equipment. He isn't one for much conversation.
node.long_descr: The wall guard smith grunts at you.

off.add: bash berserk disarm dodge kick parry assist_guard assist_vnum

node.description: This is the evil soul of a vile sergeant-at-arms who imprisoned the young girl here who eventually slew him, dying herself in the process. He has been condemned to remain here for eternity in punishment for his sins.
node.long_descr: A vile spectre lunges at you.

aff.add: invisible sanctuary infrared protect_evil sneak hide

node.description: This is the tormented soul of an innocent peasant girl, captured and dragged here by a wicked guard intent on marrying her. She slew him while trying to escape, but died herself in the process, slipping in his blood and breaking her neck. Her spirit remains here, tormented by its misery.
node.long_descr: A nearly-insubstantial ghost flits silently about.

node.description:
This kind woman cures the injuries and ailments of the city guards. She smiles at you as you enter, and bids you state your injuries so she can heal them.
Набери {y{hcлечить{x, чтобы увидеть, чем она может тебе помочь.
node.long_descr: A priestess of Lenny is here tending to the sick.

node.description: These burly fellows would be a tough foe in a barroom brawl. They have more tattoos than skin, it seems, and more hair than the average Kodiak grizzly.
node.long_descr: A burly worker shoves a heavy barrel onto a scow.

node.description: This disreputable-looking fellow is a crew member from one of the scows. He is simply waiting till its time to go.
node.long_descr: A crusty old sailor swigs from his bottle of rum.

node.description: He is far too busy to speak to you.
node.long_descr: The dock master is here checking cargo inventories.

node.description: An ornate Longsword is lying here.
node.name: sword longsword

node.description: Изукрашенный панцирь (breastplate) c черно-золотым гербом Анона лежит тут.
node.name: breastplate plate ornate изукрашенный панцирь стража стены

node.description: Изукрашенный браслет (bracer) c черно-золотым гербом Анона лежит тут.
node.name: bracer ornate изукрашенный браслет стража стены

node.description: Черный плащ (cloak) с золотой оторочкой лежит тут.
node.name: cloak black trim черный плащ с золотой оторочкой и тесьмой
node.short_descr: черн|ый|ого|ому|ый|ым|ом плащ||а|у||ом|е с золотой оторочкой и тесьмой

node.description: Узорчатый шлем (helm) c черно-золотым гербом Анона лежит тут.
node.name: helm ornate узорчатый шлем стража стены

node.description: Узорчатый щит (shield) c черно-золотым гербом Анона лежит тут.
node.name: shield ornate узорчатый щит стража стены

node.description: Прочное метательное копье (spear) воткнуто в землю.
node.name: spear throwing anon метательное копье Анона

node.description: A signet ring that identifies the wearer as a trusted wall guard lies here.
node.name: ring

node.description: A suit of heavy plate mail is piled up here.
node.name: suit plate mail

node.description: A knight's broadsword lies here.
node.name: broadsword

node.description: A knight's shield lies here.
node.name: shield

node.description: A knight's helm lies here.
node.name: helm

node.description: A pair of mail gauntlets lie here.
node.name: gauntlets

node.description: A holy signet ring lies here.
node.name: ring

node.description: The marshal's uniform lies here, neatly pressed.
node.name: marshal uniform

node.description: The marshal's swagger stick lies here.
node.name: swagger stick

node.description: This beacon illuminates the walls for guards patrolling at night.
node.name: beacon

node.description: A pot of boiling oil bubbles away here.

extraDescr.node: It is far too heavy to lift.

node.name: pot boiling oil

node.description: A murder hole is in the middle of the floor here.

extraDescr.node: A small square hole with a series of metal bars across it through which boiling oil can be poured onto attackers below.

node.name: murderhole murder hole

node.description: A finely-crafted crossbow lies here.
node.name: crossbow

node.description: A suit of chainmail lies here.
node.name: chainmail

node.description: A pair of leather leggings lie here.
node.name: leather leggings

node.description: A strip of hardened leather lies here.
node.name: leather wristguard

node.description: An old key lies here.

extraDescr.node: This key is inscribed with silvery runes.

node.name: key

node.description: An old scroll has been left here, neatly rolled and sealed.

extraDescr.node:
The scroll reads-
"Use the power of this scroll to help send the foul sergeant's spectre to the oblivion it deserves. Unlock the tower and enter. Be not weak of heart nor of sinew- the spectre is ancient and very powerful. Only the strongest shall pervail! You will find a key to break the mystic portal, use it well"

node.name: scroll

node.description: A footlocker rests near a bed.

extraDescr.node: It is bolted to the floor. Perhaps its contents are easier to abscond with.

node.name: footlocker

node.description: An ancient tapestry depicting the construction of these walls hangs here.
node.name: tapestry

node.description: An ancient tapestry depicting the construction of Midgaard hangs here.
node.name: tapestry

node.description: An ancient tapestry depicting the construction of Malathar hangs here.
node.name: tapestry

node.description: An ancient tapestry depicting the construction of Freeport hangs here.
node.name: tapestry

node.description: A belaying pin lies here.
node.name: belaying pin

node.description: A barrel of ale sits here, ready to be transported.
node.name: barrel ale

node.description: An empty barrel rests here.
node.name: barrel

node.description: A lantern sits here.
node.name: lantern

node.description: A coil of rope lies here.
node.name: rope

node.description: A leather backpack sits here.
node.name: backpack

node.description: A bolt of cloth lies on the floor here.
node.name: cloth

node.description: A warehouse key is here.
node.name: key

node.description: A scow is moored here.
node.name: scow

node.description: A cutlass lies here.
node.name: cutlass

node.description: Маленькое колечко (ring) излучает мощную магическую ауру.
node.name: ring wizardry кольцо кудесников

node.description: A staff of power rests on the floor here.
node.name: staff power

node.description: A white robe of the magi lies here.
node.name: robe magi
node.short_descr: a white robe of the magi

node.description: Пара магических ботинок (boots) скорости лежит тут.
node.name: boots speed ботинки скорости

node.description: Комплект брони (plate) выглядит абсолютно идеально -- ни царапинки!
node.extra_flags: hum dark evil invis nodrop anti_good anti_neutral noremove nolocate nofind
node.name: plate invincible непобедимая броня

node.description: You are standing inside the northern guard tower at the west gate. This tower is a circular affair approximately twenty feet in diameter and forty feet high. Straw has been scattered across the stone floor, and some plain but functional wooden furniture has been arranged about the room for off- duty guards. A spiral staircase winds its way up to the next floor in one corner. A fire burns merrily away in a hearth to the east, the smoke escaping through a small shaft that runs up one side of the turret.
node.name: Inside the Guard Tower

node.description: You are standing inside the southern guard tower at the west gate. This tower is a circular affair approximately twenty feet in diameter and forty feet high. Straw has been scattered across the stone floor, and some plain but functional wooden furniture has been arranged about the room for off- duty guards. A set of dominos and a small pile of silver pieces suggest that a friendly game between some guards was recently in progress. It seems the guards were called away in a hurry, for they left their winnings behind. A spiral staircase winds its way up to the next floor in one corner.
node.name: Inside the Guard Tower

node.description: You are standing inside the north tower at the west gatehouse. Doors lead north into the passages that run through the city walls, and south into the gatehouse proper. A staircase winds its way up to the next floor.
node.name: Inside the North Tower, West Gatehouse

node.description:
You are making you way along a narrow corridor that runs through the center of the cyclopean walls of the city of Anon. Crossbow slits at regular intervals allow you to look out upon the western plains that lie beyond the city. Crossbowmen walk back and forth, talking and joking but ever alert for any signs of attack. After a while you begin to feel slightly claustrophobic.
A door leads south into the north tower, west gatehouse.
node.name: Inside the Western City Wall

node.description: You are making you way along a narrow corridor that runs through the center of the cyclopean walls of the city of Anon. Crossbow slits at regular intervals allow you to look out upon the western plains that lie beyond the city. Crossbowmen walk back and forth, talking and joking but ever alert for any signs of attack. After a while you begin to feel slightly claustrophobic.
node.name: Inside the Western City Wall

node.description:
You are making you way along a narrow corridor that runs through the center of the cyclopean walls of the city of Anon. Crossbow slits at regular intervals allow you to look out upon the western plains that lie beyond the city. Crossbowmen walk back and forth, talking and joking but ever alert for any signs of attack. After a while you begin to feel slightly claustrophobic.
A door leads north into the northwest tower.
node.name: Inside the Western City Wall

node.description: This massive circular tower rises at the northwest corner of the city walls. It is sixty feet tall, and thirty feet in diameter, making it just about the largest tower you've ever seen. Guards march back and forth past you, barely sparing you a second glance as they busily go about their duty. Doors to the east and south allow you to enter the passages that run through the bowels of the walls, and a staircase allows you to proceed up or down through the tower.
node.name: Northwest Tower

node.description: You are standing inside the north tower at the west gatehouse. Doors lead north into the passages that run through the city walls, and south into the gatehouse proper. A staircase winds its way up to the next floor. A pile of old weapons lies in one corner, waiting to me removed.
node.name: Inside the South Tower, West Gatehouse

node.description:
You are making you way along a narrow corridor that runs through the center of the cyclopean walls of the city of Anon. Crossbow slits at regular intervals allow you to look out upon the western plains that lie beyond the city. Crossbowmen walk back and forth, talking and joking but ever alert for any signs of attack. After a while you begin to feel slightly claustrophobic.
A door leads north into the south tower, west gatehouse.
node.name: Inside the Western City Wall

node.description: You are making you way along a narrow corridor that runs through the center of the cyclopean walls of the city of Anon. Crossbow slits at regular intervals allow you to look out upon the western plains that lie beyond the city. Crossbowmen walk back and forth, talking and joking but ever alert for any signs of attack. After a while you begin to feel slightly claustrophobic.
node.name: Inside the Western City Wall

node.description:
You are making you way along a narrow corridor that runs through the center of the cyclopean walls of the city of Anon. Crossbow slits at regular intervals allow you to look out upon the western plains that lie beyond the city. Crossbowmen walk back and forth, talking and joking but ever alert for any signs of attack. After a while you begin to feel slightly claustrophobic.
A door leads south into the northwest tower.
node.name: Inside the Western City Wall

node.description:
This massive circular tower rises at the southwest corner of the city walls. It is sixty feet tall, and thirty feet in diameter, making it just about the largest tower you've ever seen. Guards march back and forth past you, barely sparing you a second glance as they busily go about their duty. Doors to the east and north allow you to enter the passages that run through the bowels of the walls, and a staircase allows you to proceed up or down through the tower.
You hear the ringing of metal against metal coming from below, and feel a sudden wave of heat, as if from a furnace.
node.name: Southwest Tower

node.description: You are standing inside the northern guard tower at the east gate. This tower is a circular affair approximately twenty feet in diameter and forty feet high. Straw has been scattered across the stone floor, and some plain but functional wooden furniture, deeply scored with dagger cuts, has been arranged about the room for off-duty guards. Several pewter mugs half-full of the local brew sit about near a game of draughts. A spiral staircase winds its way up to the next floor in one corner. A fire burns merrily away in a hearth to the east, the smoke escaping through a small shaft that runs up one side of the turret.
node.name: Inside the Guard Tower

node.description: You are standing inside the southern guard tower at the east gate. This tower is a circular affair approximately twenty feet in diameter and forty feet high. Straw has been scattered across the stone floor, and some plain but functional wooden furniture, deeply scored with dagger cuts, has been arranged about the room for off-duty guards. A spiral staircase winds its way up to the next floor in one corner. A fire burns merrily away in a hearth to the east, the smoke escaping through a small shaft that runs up one side of the turret. A small cat purrs contentedly near the fire.
node.name: Inside the Guard Tower

node.description: You are standing inside the north tower at the east gatehouse. Doors lead north into the passages that run through the city walls, and south into the gatehouse proper. A staircase winds its way up to the next floor. The eastern wall is crossletted, allowing you to gaze out upon the forbidding plains of blood.
node.name: Inside the North Tower, East Gatehouse

node.description: You are standing inside the south tower at the east gatehouse. Doors lead south into the passages that run through the city walls, and north into the gatehouse proper. A staircase winds its way up to the next floor. The eastern wall is crossletted, allowing you to gaze out upon the forbidding plains of blood. There is some writing on the wall here.

extraDescr.node:
The writing says-
"Now my charms are all o'erthrown, and what strength I have's mine own; which is most faint; now, 'tis true, I must be here confined by you, or send to Naples. Let me not, since I have my dukedom got and pardon'd the deceiver dwell in this bare siland by your spell; but release me from my bands with the help fo your good hands. Gentle breath of yours my sails must fill, or else my project fails, which was to please. Now I want spirits to enforce, art to enchant; and my ending is despair, unless I be reliev'd by prayer, which pierces so that it assaults mercy itself and frees all faults. As you from crimes would pardon'd be, let your indulgence set me free". (The Tempest, Epilogue)

node.name: Inside the South Tower, East Gatehouse

node.description: You are standing in the gatehouse that houses the great western mithril valves of the City of Anon. Massive guard towers lie to the north and south. There are murder holes set in the floor at your feet, allowing defenders to pour boiling oil upon any who manage to breach the gate. The western wall is crossletted for archers, and through it you can see the plains of western Anon, and beyond them an impenetrable mountain range.
node.name: The Gatehouse

node.description: You are standing in the gatehouse that houses the great eastern mithril valves of the City of Anon. Massive guard towers lie to the north and south. There are murder holes set in the floor at your feet, allowing defenders to pour boiling oil upon any who manage to breach the gate. The western wall is crossletted for archers, and through it you can see the forbidding plains of blood.
node.name: The Gatehouse

node.description:
You are making you way along a narrow corridor that runs through the center of the cyclopean walls of the City of Anon. Crossbow slits at regular intervals allow you to look out upon the western plains that lie beyond the city. Crossbowmen walk back and forth, talking and joking but ever alert for any signs of attack. After a while you begin to feel slightly claustrophobic.
A door leads south into the north tower, east gatehouse.
node.name: Inside the Eastern City Wall

Guards march back and forth past you, barely sparing you a second glance as they busily go about their duty. Doors to the west and north allow you to enter the passages that run through the bowels of the walls, and a staircase allows you to proceed up or down through the tower.
node.name: Southeast Tower

node.description: You are in the north tower, western gatehouse. The staircase you have been using continues up and down through the tower. Doors lead north and south onto the battlements.
node.name: North Tower, Western Gatehouse

node.description: You are in the south tower, western gatehouse. The staircase you have been using continues up and down through the tower. Doors lead north and south onto the battlements.
node.name: South Tower, Western Gatehouse

node.description: You are in the north tower, eastern gatehouse. The staircase you have been using continues up and down through the tower. Doors lead north and south onto the battlements.
node.name: North Tower, Eastern Gatehouse

node.description: You are in the south tower, eastern gatehouse. The staircase you have been using continues up and down through the tower. Doors lead north and south onto the battlements.
node.name: South Tower, Eastern Gatehouse

node.description:
You are advancing along the long narrow passage that runs through the center of the vast northern wall of the City of Anon. This passage, like the shorter eastern and western versions, is crossletted at regular intervals, and regularly patrolled by squads of crossbowmen.
A door leads west into northwest tower.
node.name: Within the Walls

node.description: You are advancing along the long narrow passage that runs through the center of the vast northern wall of the City of Anon. This passage, like the shorter eastern and western versions, is crossletted at regular intervals, and regularly patrolled by squads of crossbowmen.

node.description: You are advancing along the long narrow passage that runs through the center of the vast southern wall of the City of Anon. This passage, like the shorter eastern and western versions, is crossletted at regular intervals, and regularly patrolled by squads of crossbowmen.
node.name: Within the Walls

node.description: You are advancing along the long narrow passage that runs through the center of the vast southern wall of the City of Anon. This passage, like the shorter eastern and western versions, is crossletted at regular intervals, and regularly patrolled by squads of crossbowmen.
node.name: Within the Walls

node.description: You are advancing along the long narrow passage that runs through the center of the vast southern wall of the City of Anon. This passage, like the shorter eastern and western versions, is crossletted at regular intervals, and regularly patrolled by squads of crossbowmen.
node.name: Within the Walls

node.description: You are advancing along the long narrow passage that runs through the center of the vast southern wall of the City of Anon. This passage, like the shorter eastern and western versions, is crossletted at regular intervals, and regularly patrolled by squads of crossbowmen.
node.name: Within the Walls

node.description: You are advancing along the long narrow passage that runs through the center of the vast southern wall of the City of Anon. This passage, like the shorter eastern and western versions, is crossletted at regular intervals, and regularly patrolled by squads of crossbowmen.
node.name: Within the Walls

node.description: You are advancing along the long narrow passage that runs through the center of the vast southern wall of the City of Anon. This passage, like the shorter eastern and western versions, is crossletted at regular intervals, and regularly patrolled by squads of crossbowmen.
node.name: Within the Walls

node.description: You are advancing along the long narrow passage that runs through the center of the vast southern wall of the City of Anon. This passage, like the shorter eastern and western versions, is crossletted at regular intervals, and regularly patrolled by squads of crossbowmen.
node.name: Within the Walls

node.description: You are advancing along the long narrow passage that runs through the center of the vast southern wall of the City of Anon. This passage, like the shorter eastern and western versions, is crossletted at regular intervals, and regularly patrolled by squads of crossbowmen.
node.name: Within the Walls

node.description: You are advancing along the long narrow passage that runs through the center of the vast southern wall of the City of Anon. This passage, like the shorter eastern and western versions, is crossletted at regular intervals, and regularly patrolled by squads of crossbowmen.
node.name: Within the Walls

node.description:
You are advancing along the long narrow passage that runs through the center of the vast southern wall of the City of Anon. This passage, like the shorter eastern and western versions, is crossletted at regular intervals, and regularly patrolled by squads of crossbowmen.
A door to the east leads into southeast tower.
node.name: Within the Walls

node.description: You have reached the bottom of Northwest tower, the huge tower at the northwestern corner of the walls of the City of Anon. It appears to serve as some sort of storage area, being as it is full of weapons and armor. There are no visible exits, besides the staircase back up.
node.name: Base of Northwest Tower

node.description: This room is dusty and full of cobwebs. It probably hasn't been entered in ages. Coughing, you make your way through a jumble of debris, looking for another exit, but you find none. You do spy several torn scraps of what looks like scrolls scattered about, though.
node.name: Base of Northeast Tower

node.description: This chamber serves as quarters for the wall guard smith. He spends most of his day down here in this smithy, repairing the damaged equipment of the guards. He may even repair yours.
node.name: Base of Southwest Tower

node.description: This rooms is totally devoid of furniture, and looks to have been swept recently. Wonder what it will be used for...?
node.name: Base of Southeast Tower

node.description: You are inside the northwest tower of the walls of Anon. Up from here are the offices of some of the guard officers and other personnel. Doors lead east and south out onto the battlements.
node.name: Northwest Tower

node.description: You are inside the northwest tower of the walls of Anon. From the look of it it hasn't been cleaned in ages. A bolted iron trapdoor blocks the staircase leading up. How odd...

node.name: up
node.description: As you look closer, you notice the door is lined with silver runes...

node.name: Northeast Tower

node.description: You are inside the southwest tower of the walls of Anon. Up from here are the offices of some of the guard officers and other personnel. Doors lead east and north out onto the battlements.
node.name: Southwest Tower

node.description: You are inside the southeast tower of the walls of Anon. Up from here are the offices of some of the guard officers and other personnel. Doors lead west and north out onto the battlements.
node.name: Southeast Tower

node.description: Guards nod briefly at you, with slight curiosity as you advance up into this guard tower. This level appears to be the quarters of many of them, judging by the neatly-made beds and clothes racks. A trapdoor in the ceiling leads up the the roof of the tower.
node.name: North Tower, West Gatehouse

node.description: Guards nod briefly at you, with slight curiosity as you advance up into this guard tower. This level appears to be the quarters of many of them, judging by the neatly-made beds and clothes racks. A trapdoor in the ceiling leads up the the roof of the tower.
node.name: South Tower, West Gatehouse

node.description: Guards nod briefly at you, with slight curiosity as you advance up into this guard tower. This level appears to be the quarters of many of them, judging by the neatly-made beds and clothes racks. A trapdoor in the ceiling leads up the the roof of the tower.
node.name: North Tower, East Gatehouse

node.description: Guards nod briefly at you, with slight curiosity as you advance up into this guard tower. This level appears to be the quarters of many of them, judging by the neatly-made beds and clothes racks. A trapdoor in the ceiling leads up the the roof of the tower.
node.name: South Tower, East Gatehouse

node.description: You are standing on the roof of the tower. Looking around, you can see the sprawl of Anon to the east, the roof of the temple dominating the scene in the mid-center. To the west you can see the vast plains that stretch for miles to the distant mountain ranges, where few have dared to travel. To the south lies more fields, divided up by features such as the river of Anon.
node.name: The Roof of the Tower

node.description: You are standing on the roof of the tower. Looking around, you can see the sprawl of Anon to the east, the roof of the temple dominating the scene in the mid-center. To the west you can see the vast plains that stretch for miles to the distant mountain ranges, where few have dared to travel. To the south lies more fields, divided up by features such as the river of Anon.
node.name: The Roof of the Tower

node.description: You are standing on the roof of the tower. Looking around, you can see the sprawl of Anon to the east, the roof of the temple dominating the scene in the mid-center. To the west you can see the vast plains that stretch for miles to the distant mountain ranges, where few have dared to travel. To the south lies more fields, divided up by features such as the river of Anon.
node.name: The Roof of the Tower

node.description: You are standing on the roof of the tower. Looking around, you can see the sprawl of Anon to the east, the roof of the temple dominating the scene in the mid-center. To the west you can see the vast plains that stretch for miles to the distant mountain ranges, where few have dared to travel. To the south lies more fields, divided up by features such as the river of Anon.
node.name: The Roof of the Tower

node.description: You are standing on the short section of the battlements that runs between the north and south towers of the western gatehouse. Below, you can see travellers making their way into and out of the city.
node.name: Atop the Gatehouse

node.description: You are standing on the short section of the battlements that runs between the north and south towers of the eastern gatehouse. Below, you can see travellers making their way into and out of the city. Looking west, you see smoke rising from the blasted terrain of the plains of blood, and wonder if there is another raiding party coming.
node.name: Atop the Gatehouse

node.description:
You are heading along the northern half of the battlements on the western wall. Looking west, you can see far across the plains. Smoke rises from several settlements, including Solace, Midgaard, the Gnome village and the Shire.
A door to the south leads into the north tower, western gatehouse.
node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

node.description:
You are heading along the southern half of the battlements on the western wall. Guards nod at you as you pass, before quickly returning to their observation of the land and the city, and you admire their dedication to their work.
A door to the north leads into the southern tower, western gatehouse.
node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

node.description:
You are heading along the northern half of the battlements on the eastern wall. Peering over the crenelations, you shudder as you gaze upon the desolate wastes of the plains of blood. You cast your eye about to try and spot something more pleasing, but only see the old marsh and the acid forest. Charming terrain.
A door to the south leads into the northern tower, eastern gatehouse.
node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

node.description:
You are heading along the southern half of the battlements on the eastern wall. Seagulls circle overhead, and you are puzzling at their presence when you suddenly remember the river of Anon runs just south east of here. Looking over the crenelations, you see it flowing swiftly along, parallel to the south wall, heading off into a thick forest.
A door to the north leads into the southern tower, eastern gatehouse.
node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

node.description: You are heading along the northern half of the battlements on the western wall. Looking west, you can see far across the plains. Smoke rises from several settlements, including Solace, Midgaard, the Gnome village and the Shire.
node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

node.description: Просторная и хорошо организованная гавань Анона, выходящая на Кровавое Море, принимает десятки кораблей каждый день. В далеком прошлом город полагался больше на караваны с востока, но после разрушения Талоса торговцы предпочли морское сообщение сухопутному.
node.name: Гавань Анона

node.description:
You are heading along the northern half of the battlements on the western wall. Looking west, you can see far across the plains. Smoke rises from several settlements, including Solace, Midgaard, the Gnome village and the Shire.
A door leads into northwest tower north of here.
node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

node.description: You are heading along the southern half of the battlements on the western wall. Guards nod at you as you pass, before quickly returning to their observation of the land and the city, and you admire their dedication to their work.
node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

node.description: Ты оказываешься на причалах гавани Анона. На юге простирается Кровавое Море. Большой залив продолжается на юго-востоке, где в дымке виднеются мрачные отроги Южных Гор. К причалам пришвартованы несколько плоскодонок и пара грузовых барж. Бородатые грузчики с матерками переносят тяжелые ящики и бочки. Они бурчат что-то условно приветственное при твоем появлении и продолжают работу.
node.name: Причалы Анона

node.description:
You are heading along the southern half of the battlements on the western wall. Guards nod at you as you pass, before quickly returning to their observation of the land and the city, and you admire their dedication to their work.
A door to the south leads into southwest tower.
node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

node.description: You are heading along the southern half of the battlements on the eastern wall. Seagulls circle overhead, and you are puzzling at their presence when you suddenly remember the river of Anon runs just south east of here. Looking over the crenelations, you see it flowing swiftly along, parallel to the south wall, heading off into a thick forest.
node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

node.description: You are standing outside several warehouses. Most of them are boarded up and empty. However, there is one to the south that appears to be still in use.
node.name: Warehouses

node.description:
You are heading along the southern half of the battlements on the eastern wall. Seagulls circle overhead, and you are puzzling at their presence when you suddenly remember the river of Anon runs just south east of here. Looking over the crenelations, you see it flowing swiftly along, parallel to the south wall, heading off into a thick forest.
A door to the south leads into southeast tower.
node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

node.description: You are heading along the northern half of the battlements on the eastern wall. Peering over the crenelations, you shudder as you gaze upon the desolate wastes of the plains of blood. You cast your eye about to try and spot something more pleasing, but only see the old marsh and the acid forest. Charming terrain.
node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

node.description: This warehouse is filled with general goods such as coils of rope, piles of cheap cloth, barrels of ale and wine, lanterns, flasks of oil, jars of spices and dried meats. There is a sweet aroma in the air.
node.name: A Warehouse

node.description:
You are heading along the northern half of the battlements on the eastern wall. Peering over the crenelations, you shudder as you gaze upon the desolate wastes of the plains of blood. You cast your eye about to try and spot something more pleasing, but only see the old marsh and the acid forest. Charming terrain.
A door to the north leads into northwest tower. There is a sign tacked to it.

node.name: north
node.description: The sign reads- "KEEP OUT! By order of the Marshal"

node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

node.description:
You are heading along the huge northern wall of the City of Anon. This wall extends for at least twice the distance of the east and west walls, protecting the vulnerable northern aspect of the city from the constant attacks by warring raiders from the northern plains. Peering about, you see little of note, save the dark stretch of Mirkwood. Who knows what adventures may be found in there...?
A door leads west into northwest tower.
node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

node.description: You are heading along the huge northern wall of the City of Anon. This wall extends for at least twice the distance of the east and west walls, protecting the vulnerable northern aspect of the city from the constant attacks by warring raiders from the northern plains. Peering about, you see little of note, save the dark stretch of Mirkwood. Who knows what adventures may be found in there...?
node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

This wall extends for at least twice the distance of the east and west walls, protecting the vulnerable northern aspect of the city from the constant attacks by warring raiders from the northern plains. Peering about, you see little of note, save the dark stretch of Mirkwood. Who knows what adventures may be found in there...?
node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

Peering about, you see little of note, save the dark stretch of Mirkwood. Who knows what adventures may be found in there...?

node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

node.description:
You are heading along the huge northern wall of the City of Anon. This wall extends for at least twice the distance of the east and west walls, protecting the vulnerable northern aspect of the city from the constant attacks by warring raiders from the northern plains. Peering about, you see little of note, save the dark stretch of Mirkwood. Who knows what adventures may be found in there...?
A door leads east into northeast tower. There is a sign tacked to it.

node.name: east
node.description: The sign says- "Keep Out! By order of the Marshal"

node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

node.description:
You are strolling along the vast southern wall of the City of Anon, enjoying the cool breeze and the scenic view. The guards call this the "easy spot" because there has never been an assault from the south on the city, mostly due to the presence of the mighty Anon River, which flows parallel to this wall. You smile, relax and enjoy the walk.
A door to the west leads into southwest tower.
node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

node.description: You are strolling along the vast southern wall of the City of Anon, enjoying the cool breeze and the scenic view. The guards call this the "easy spot" because there has never been an assault from the south on the city, mostly due to the presence of the mighty Anon River, which flows parallel to this wall. You smile, relax and enjoy the walk.
node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

The guards call this the "easy spot" because there has never been an assault from the south on the city, mostly due to the presence of the mighty Anon River, which flows parallel to this wall. You smile, relax and enjoy the walk.

You smile, relax and enjoy the walk.
node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

node.description:
You are strolling along the vast southern wall of the City of Anon, enjoying the cool breeze and the scenic view. The guards call this the "easy spot" because there has never been an assault from the south on the city, mostly due to the presence of the mighty Anon River, which flows parallel to this wall. You smile, relax and enjoy the walk.
A door to the east leads into southeast tower.
node.name: Heading Along the Battlements

node.description: This room serves as the quarters of the commanders of the north and west wall guards. It is sparsely decorated, featuring only two beds, two wardrobes, a mirror and two footlockers. A few weapons are neatly arranged on one wall, and a throw rug lies near the staircase.
node.name: Northwest Tower

node.description: This room serves as quarters to the Knights of the Grand and Holy Order of Anon assigned to wall guard duty. This room resembles a chapel more than anything, with two small cots arranged near an altar bearing a chalice and a ewer. A tapestry hangs on one wall, depicting knights receiving blessings from Lenny.
node.name: Southwest Tower

node.description: This room serves as the quarters of the commanders of the south and east wall guards. It is sparsely decorated, featuring only two beds, two wardrobes, a mirror and two footlockers. A few weapons are neatly arranged on one wall, and a throw rug lies near the staircase.
node.name: Southeast Tower

node.description: This room has an evil feel to it. The smashed furniture, bloodstains and broken bones are bad enough, but in addition there is a definite evil aura to this fell domain, as if some foul deed has been perpetrated here. You get the distinct feeling that this place is haunted.
node.name: A Dusty Chamber

node.description: This room is the quarters of the Guards Provost-Marshal, Glenwellucan Mad- Llleweleucam. He is a rather senile old veteran of more wars than he could possibly count. The room is littered with memorabilia, probably worth a fortune to a collector, but useless to you. Then again, maybe not...
node.name: The Top of Northwest Tower

node.description: The Marshal uses this area as a relaxation area. There is a deckchair and a small table, for use on sunny days- the Marshal sports a very healthy tan. An umbrella lies folded up next to a bookcase with several tattered magazines.
node.name: The Roof of Northwest Tower

node.description: Here reside the battlemages currently in the employ of the City. As they spend little free time doing anything but meditating or learning new spells, this room has little of interest. There is a bookcase full of scrolls, but none of them are magical.
node.name: The Battlemages' Quarters

node.description: This roof is totally featureless. Peering through the crenelations, you get a good view of southwestern Anon, though. Due south lies the cursed forest wherein a Witches' Coven is supposed to exist, and beyond that lies the fabled elemental canyon.
node.name: The Roof of Southwest Tower

node.description: In this room, generous priests and priestesses of Lenny give up their time to tend to the illnesses of the city guards. They will tend to others' injuries as well, for a fee. Such is the way of Lenny.
node.name: The Healing Chambers

node.description: This roof has been recently swept clean, and a stone altar erected to the Gods. The sun is caught by a reflecting crystal so that it shines directly onto the altar at all times during the day. The effect is quite splendid. You feel totally at ease in this place.
node.name: The Roof of Southeast Tower

node.description: This room has an evil feel to it. The smashed furniture, bloodstains and broken bones are bad enough, but in addition there is a definite evil aura to this fell domain, as if some foul deed has been perpetrated here. You get the distinct feeling that this place is haunted.
node.name: A Dusty Chamber

node.description: This roof has not bee visited in a long time. The trapdoor is covered in silvery mystic runes, as is the stone around it. A chill wind blows here, at all times, and birds have been known to die when flying too close. It is truly a cursed place.
node.name: The Roof of the Cursed Northeast Tower

node.description: In here Clea, the beautiful Elven Artificer from Malathar, offers a popular service, reharging magical staves and wands that have lost their energies. Piles of such items can be seen, awaiting retrieval by their owners. You feel quite comfortable in this simple yet pleasant workshop.
node.name: The Artificer's Workshop

node.description: Этот старый книжный магазинчик полностью заставлен высоченными полками с фолиантами, манускриптами и инкунабулами всех сортов и размеров. Перед тобой за шаткой конторкой сидит владелец магазинчика и читает какую-то интересную книгу. Обязательно прочти тома по истории и общественном укладе!
node.name: Книжный магазинчик Ксанафакса

node.description: В тесной мастерской усердно трудится маленький толстенький дварф, изготавливая самые разные ключи и отмычки. По всей мастерской расставлены самые удивительные станки и инструменты для слесарного мастерства.
node.name: Мастерская ключника

node.description: На стене у тренера развешаны многочисленные дипломы и медали с различных спортивных соревнований. Тренер Том дружелюбно машет рукой и приглашает тебя натренировать параметры.
node.name: Дом тренера
